summary: Barbie is starting her sophomore year and everything changes when she gets a special diary that grants her wishes.
cast: Kelly Sheridan|Sarah Edmondson|Venus Terzo|Chiara Zanni|Matt Hill|Andrew Francis|Maryke Hendrikse|Anna Cummer|Heather Doerksen|Joseph May|Ashleigh Ball|Michael Daingerfield|Tabitha St. Germain|Cathy Weseluck|Lidia Abautt|Yaraivi Alcedo|Aden Hakimi|Skye Sweetnam|Justin Weg
title: Los diarios de Barbie
